name: Missile Run
description:
Chaotic multiplayer pitting you and your friends against each other and a heatseeking missile.

Missile Run is a game in which you and up to 4 of your friends are launched into an arena with a heatseeking missile. The missile tracks the closest player and the last one alive wins in each of the short action-packed rounds. Use the cover from pillars and powerups to evade the missile and possibly put other players in precarious situations.
